name: BlockWrestle
description:
A fun multiplayer game to play with friends!

Player 1(Purple):

Move up: W Move down: S Move right: D Move left: A Special abilty: Space

Player 2(Turquoise): 

Move up: Up arrow Move down: Down arrow Move right: Right arrow Move left: Left Arrow Special abilty: Right shift

This game is still in very  deep development and much more things are going to be added. 

Roadmap:

Add more levels with more design
Add more abilties
Add online multiplayer function

Please if you guys have any suggestions for this game, give some advice in the comments below!
